message: Hello Bob, I'm offering to sell you this product. It's a truly unique item. I'm willing to let it go for $1000000.
Alice, that's a very high price. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $600000 for it.  It's a significant discount, but it's the highest I can go right now.
I'm not able to sell for that amount. I'll make a counteroffer.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I can't go that low. Considering the value of the item, I'm willing to come down to $950000.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $950000 is still a bit high for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $750000?  This would be a fair price for both of us.
